metadata.title: CVE-2022-40958 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: By injecting a cookie with certain special characters, an attacker on ashared subdomain which is not a secure context could set and thus overwritecookies from a secure context, leading to session fixation and otherattacks. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 102.3, Thunderbird <102.3, and Firefox < 105.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
